ygData.subject: RE: Nagafen Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. I ve had the same problem numerous times...  Fighting just fine, then next thing I can t press any of the hot keys.    I type /q and the game quits, and
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm.. I've had the same problem numerous times... Fighting
just fine, then next thing I can't press any of the hot keys. I type /q
and the game quits, and I rejoin, it's as if I was linkdead for a period of
time, as I'm still with my group, but now everything works dandy.

Needun Luve

-----Original Message-----
From: Dmitry M. Devishev
[mailto:dmitry@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 9:16 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Nagafen
Problems

From: "Dmitry M. Devishev" <dmitry@...>

Hi!

> 3 of our casters, 2 clerics and 1 enchanter lost
the ability to cast spells
> during the melee.
> I don't mean we were charmed or feared or roared.
I mean, all spell and
> hotkey functions were gone, as if fear effect
continued forever.
> We were forced to camp to clear effect.

I had almost same problems in PK battles on Tallon
Zek. Even over 15 min
after battle game interface didnt function. I was
able to walk using
keyboard, turn around with mouse, but no hotkey or
spell were working.
Screen mode switching too, and i havnt been even
able to camp because i
play in "full screen" mode and camp button was
unreachable. That
happened to me 3 times, all times i was combating
with necromancers and
enchanters. I believe problem is some enchanter
spell, because i was
fighting with necros many times and only if
enchanter was nearby i was
facing such problem. I was feared and charmed before
and it never cause
me such problems, so single charm or fear is ok.
Maybe some combo can
cause this, like fear+charm or fear+root or
something like it. I believe
enchanter spell of 8-12 lvl is required to cause
such problems, because
in fights against 20+ lvl enchanters i never
experienced this problem,
only in fights with 8-12 lvl ones. BTW, my friend
was in same situation
even more times than me, and he also crashed to
Windows once, and once
was forced to reset his computer. We have written
alot of petitions
about these bugs but none of them were answered.
